# tuinix GitHub Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration files.

## Documentation

All project documentation lives on the
[tuinix docs site](https://timlinux.github.io/tuinix/).

## Contents

### GitHub Configuration

- `workflows/` -- GitHub Actions CI/CD pipelines
- `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` -- Bug report, feature request, and question templates
- `assets/` -- Logo and visual assets
- `pull_request_template.md` -- PR template
- `CLAUDE.md` -- AI assistant directives
